note:
half grown-up Commodore 64 kid, RC2014 enthusiast, Linux platform engineer and hobbyist retro coder (C / FORTH / BASIC and a little bit of ASM). Z80 convert.

Remember: 64K should be enough for everyone!

SysOp of telnet BBSes "Wintermute BBS" (wintermutebbs.ddns.net:23) and the infamous "RC-BOX BBS" (rc2014.ddns.net:2014), the world's first and (currently) only #rc2014 based telnet BBS !!

fields.name: Tech:
fields.value: Commodore 64, RC2014, ZX Spectrum, CP/M ,  Linux / UNIX

fields.name: Coding:
fields.value: C / FORTH / BASIC (yes, BASIC) / Z80 Assembler
